bilingual.source: We should do what we can to stop pollution.
bilingual.target: 我们应该尽力阻止污染。

bilingual.source: The pollution from factories filled the air.
bilingual.target: 工厂的污染充满了空气。

bilingual.source: The pollution is also bad for their health.
bilingual.target: 污染对他们的健康也有害。

list.abstract: pollute：读音：英 [pəˈluːt] 美 [pəˈlut] 释义：污染，弄脏

yingyinNormal.en: Shenzhen also suffers high levels of pollution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 深圳也受着严重污染的戕害。

yingyinNormal.en: It is real that the pollution is severe at the present stage, in big cities like Beijing, Tianjin, always pollution haze.
yingyinNormal.zh: 的确，现在的环境污染很严重，北京、天津这样的大城市，冬天总是被雾霾笼罩着。

yingyinNormal.en: China's rapidly growing cities have caused pollution on a scale not seen in history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国迅速发展的众多城市引发了污染，其规模史无前例。

yingyinNormal.en: How will China tackle modern issues like energy, pollution and overpopulation?
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国将如何应对这些现代型问题，比如能源、污染和人口过多？

yingyinNormal.en: Engineering solutions are required to supply the huge amounts of energy that are needed to reduce pollution that's affecting almost half of its nearly 1.4 billion populations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 各类工程解决方案既要提供大量能源，又要减少污染。这污染几乎影响到了近14亿人口中的一半。

yingyinNormal.en: Even at the heart of this city facing the ocean, the disgusting pollution means we cannot go into the sea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即使在这座海滨城市的中心，恶心的污染意味着我们无法下海。

yingyinNormal.en: At home, we've invested in clean energy cut carbon pollution, and created new jobs in the process.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在国内，我们已经大幅投资于清洁能源削减了碳排放，并在努力创造着新的就业机会。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Car manufacturers' cheating is the real cause of our toxic <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汽车生产商的舞弊行为才是造成有毒污染的真正原因。

examination_example.sentence: Wales has introduced special low speed limits to minimise <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尔士引入了特定的低速限制，以最大限度地减少污染。

examination_example.sentence: At night, scan the horizon for artificial light sources, such as fires and streetlights, then walk toward the glow of light <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在晚上，扫描地平线上的人造光源，如火和街灯，然后朝着光污染的光芒走去。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Traffic has become synonymous with air <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通已经成为空气污染的近义词。

examination_example.sentence: An estimated 4.5 million people died prematurely from outdoor air <highlight>pollution</highlight> in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2015年，估计有450万人因室外空气污染过早死亡。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 污染, 弄脏

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 空气污染；大气污染；环境空气污染
环境污染；环境问题；环境污染问题

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Air <highlight>pollution</highlight> costs the global economy more than $5 trillion annually in welfare costs, with the most serious damage occurring in the developing world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 空气污染每年给全球经济造成超过5万亿美元的福利损失，其中最严重的损害发生在发展中国家。

examination_example.sentence: Around 9 in 10 people in low- and middle- income countries live in places where they regularly experience dangerous levels of outdoor air <highlight>pollution</highlight>. But the problem is not limited exclusively to the developing world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在低收入和中等收入国家，大约十分之九的人生活在他们经常经历户外空气污染处于危险程度的地方。但这个问题并不仅限于发展中国家。

examination_example.sentence: Millions die early from air <highlight>pollution</highlight> each year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每年有数百万人早早死于空气污染。

examination_example.sentence: Indoor <highlight>pollution</highlight>, which includes sources like home heating and cooking, has remained constant over the past several decades despite advances in the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 室内污染，包括家庭取暖和烹饪等来源，尽管该地区取得了进步，但在过去几十年中一直保持不变。

examination_example.sentence: Levels of outdoor <highlight>pollution</highlight> have grown rapidly along with rapid growth in industry and transportation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着工业和交通的快速增长，室外污染水平迅速上升。

examination_example.sentence: Maintaining safe speeds and being electric, self-driving cars would drastically reduce <highlight>pollution</highlight> levels and dependency on non-renewable fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自动驾驶汽车在保持安全速度和电动化的前提下，将大幅降低污染水平和对不可再生燃料的依赖。

examination_example.sentence: The effects of air <highlight>pollution</highlight> are worst in the developing world, where in some places lost-labor income equals nearly 1% of GDP.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 空气污染的影响在发展中国家是最严重的，在一些地方，劳动力损失收入相当于国内生产总值(GDP)的近1%。

examination_example.sentence: The figures include a number of costs associated with air <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些数字包括了与空气污染有关的一些成本。

examination_example.sentence: The report includes both indoor and outdoor air <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该报告包括室内和室外空气污染。

examination_example.sentence: Conversely, "cycle to work" days have done their job by creating <highlight>pollution</highlight> lows.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，“骑车上班”可降低污染。

examination_example.sentence: Davida Herzl, Aclima's boss, says they have revealed <highlight>pollution</highlight> highs on days when San Francisco's transit workers went on strike and the city's inhabitants were forced to use their cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Aclima 的老板 Davida Herzl 表示，他们发现旧金山的运输工人罢工，城市居民被迫开汽车时，空气污染达到了高峰。

examination_example.sentence: Fresno, in the central valley, comes top of the list in America for year-round <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 位于中部山谷的弗雷斯诺(Fresno)在美国全年污染中名列前茅。

examination_example.sentence: Green buildings like this aren't necessarily cost-efficient for the investor, but it does produce much less <highlight>pollution</highlight> than that caused by energy production through fossil fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对投资者来说，这样的环保建筑不一定具有成本效益，但它产生的污染远少于通过化石燃料产出能源所造成的污染。

examination_example.sentence: It has been trying out monitoring stations that are intended to yield minute-to-minute maps of outdoor air <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它一直在试行监测站，以绘制出每分钟的室外空气污染图。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Soil <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 土地污染。

examination_example.sentence: Her popular 1962 book Silent Spring raised awareness of the dangers of <highlight>pollution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她在1962年出版的畅销书《寂静的春天》，提高了人们对污染的有害影响的认识。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 空气污染；大气污染；环境空气污染
水污染；水质污染；水体污染
土壤污染；土壤环境污染；土壤的污染

examination_example.sentence: From the prediction of the World Economic Forum in 2018, we can learn ocean plastic <highlight>pollution</highlight> is serious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从2018年世界经济论坛的预测中可以得知，海洋塑料污染问题非常严重。

examination_example.sentence: Climate change will cause air <highlight>pollution</highlight> and diseases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 气候变化会导致空气污染和疾病。

examination_example.sentence: Air <highlight>pollution</highlight> will remain a problem for a long time,
examination_example.sentence_trans: 空气污染是长时间内都会存在的一个问题。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 污染, 弄脏
